name: AI Visibility
description: Measures how often your brand appears in AI-generated responses across major LLMs

insights.title: Strong presence in ChatGPT responses
insights.description: Your brand appears in 78% of relevant queries on ChatGPT, significantly above industry average of 45%

insights.title: Limited visibility on Perplexity
insights.description: Only 32% mention rate on Perplexity for industry-related queries

issues.title: Missing from product comparison queries
issues.description: Brand not mentioned in 65% of product comparison queries despite market position

recommendations.title: Optimize content for comparison contexts
recommendations.description: Create detailed comparison content that positions your products against competitors
actionItems: Add structured data markup for product features

name: Brand Voice & Consistency
description: Analyzes how consistently your brand message appears across AI platforms

insights.title: Consistent messaging across platforms
insights.description: 85% consistency in how AI models describe your brand value proposition

insights.title: Strong brand differentiation
insights.description: AI models clearly distinguish your brand from competitors in 9/10 queries

issues.title: Outdated product descriptions in some responses
issues.description: 15% of AI responses reference discontinued products or old features

recommendations.title: Update product documentation
recommendations.description: Ensure all public-facing documentation reflects current product lineup
actionItems: Audit all product pages for accuracy
Submit updated sitemaps to search engines

name: E-E-A-T & Trust Signals
description: Evaluates expertise, experience, authoritativeness, and trustworthiness signals

insights.title: Strong expertise signals detected
insights.description: Content demonstrates deep domain knowledge in 82% of analyzed pages

insights.title: Limited author credentials
insights.description: Only 45% of content has clear author attribution with credentials

issues.title: Weak citation network
issues.description: Limited external citations to authoritative sources in key content pieces

issues.title: Missing trust indicators
issues.description: Lack of security badges, certifications, and trust seals on critical pages

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive author attribution
recommendations.description: Add detailed author bios with credentials to all content pages

name: Non-Branded Keyword Coverage
description: Measures visibility for industry terms and non-branded search queries

insights.title: Strong coverage in core category
insights.description: Ranking for 78% of primary category keywords

insights.title: Gaps in emerging topics
insights.description: Missing from 60% of trending industry keywords from the last 6 months

issues.title: Weak long-tail keyword presence
issues.description: Capturing only 35% of available long-tail keyword opportunities

recommendations.title: Develop content for emerging topics
recommendations.description: Create authoritative content addressing new industry trends and technologies

name: Content Depth & Quality
description: Assesses the comprehensiveness and quality of content across your domain

insights.title: Excellent content depth
insights.description: Average content depth score of 88/100 across key pages

insights.title: High engagement signals
insights.description: Content shows strong user engagement metrics indicating quality

issues.title: Some thin content pages
issues.description: 12% of pages have insufficient content depth for their topic

recommendations.title: Expand thin content pages
recommendations.description: Enhance pages with insufficient depth to match user intent

name: Citations & References
description: Tracks how often your brand is cited and referenced by authoritative sources

insights.title: Growing citation network
insights.description: 25% increase in citations from authoritative sources over last quarter

insights.title: Strong industry publication presence
insights.description: Featured in 8 of top 10 industry publications

issues.title: Limited academic citations
issues.description: Low presence in academic papers and research

recommendations.title: Build academic partnerships
recommendations.description: Engage with academic institutions to increase research citations
actionItems: Sponsor or participate in research studies
Publish white papers and research findings
Partner with universities on case studies

name: Competitive Position
description: Analyzes your position relative to competitors in AI-generated responses

insights.title: Top 3 positioning in category
insights.description: Consistently ranked in top 3 when AI models list category leaders

insights.title: Strong differentiation
insights.description: Unique value propositions clearly communicated in 85% of mentions

issues.title: Competitor outperforms in specific queries
issues.description: Main competitor mentioned more frequently in 45% of feature-specific queries

recommendations.title: Strengthen feature-specific content
recommendations.description: Create detailed content around key features where competitors currently lead
